alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 18 at 7:23PM PST until November 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts of 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Ventura County Valleys and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest late tonight through late Saturday morning. In the San Fernando Valley, the strongest winds will be across northern and western portions of the valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects such as lawn furniture.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley
